SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Public interface of an act.
ActionException
Error occured while performing an act.
ActionFactory
Generates instances of acts.
ActionFactoryException
Error occured while creating an instance of an act.
Criterion
Defines how to judge a given data object.
CriterionNotEvaluatedException
Error occurred while retrieving unevaluated criterion result.
DataResource
Provide a REST interface for the rules engine to receive data from external clients.
Engine
Given a set of criteria and a piece of data, the engine identifies which rules are applicable and executes the actions of all the applicable rules.
Engine.Status
Identifies the possible states of the engine.
EngineRequest
Defines the request structure for the EngineResource REST endpoint.
EngineResource
Manage the engine via a REST interface.
EngineResource.Status
Identifies the possible statuses returned by this resource.
EngineResponse
Defines the response structure for the DataResource and EngineResource REST endpoints.
Logic
Public interface of a unit of logic.
LogicCriterionException
Error occurred while evaluating a unit of logic: unknown internal method name.
LogicDataTypeException
Error occurred while evaluating a unit of logic: incompatible data type.
LogicFactory
Generates instances of units of logic.
LogicFactoryException
Error occured while creating an instance of a unit of logic.
ObservationData
Defines the data associated with an observation of a patient.
ObservationLogic
Defines the logic associated with an observation of a patient.
ParameterException
Error occured while adding a parameter to an act.
PatientData
Defines the data associated with a patient.
PatientData.Gender
Identifies the possible biological genders of a patient.
PatientLogic
Defines the logic associated with a patient.
Rule
Defines the set of actions to execute when the set of criteria evaluates to true.
RuleActionDataTransfer
Defines a single record returned from the database by the RuleActions named query.
RuleCriterionDataTransfer
Defines a single record returned from the database by the RuleCriteria named query.
RuleIdActionSequence
Associates a rule ID with one of its action execution order numbers.
RuleRepository
Builds and stores the rule set (including criteria and actions) used by the engine.
SendEmail
Defines the act of sending an email message.
